idea: This is a search engine for the city in India. The idea behind this concept is to List all the local businesses in a particular city(Food shops/Cooking done ladies at small scale/Classes/Small-large Grocery shops/Carpenters/Mechanics/Civil line workers etc.) List all the tourist and public spots(playgrounds/recreational zones etc) in the city. This will help to build/update the local infrastructure. And create a self-sustainable city. List the city related news as a City News Bulletin (Daily/weekly/monthly updates)Create user profiles for every person. The user could be an end-user who will consume the content or he can list his small/large business on this platform so he can get instant recognition by listing his business on the Portal. Every business person can monetize his business with basic to advanced analytics provided in the system so that he can continue on his growth. The basic plan for everyone will be free. The major source of revenue for this portal would be advertisements.
name: City Search

idea:
Corporate Galaxy is a full service executive search firm focussed on providing end to end human capital solutions to corporates who realize the value of human resources in business.

We aspire to provide both global and national clients with high-quality and seamless executive search services. and build a reputation of excellence in leadership and management search. The highly motivated team of executive search experts with unparalleled depth of knowledge and expertise offer an unsurpassed level of attention, building a long term relationship with clients and candidates alike.
name: Corporate Galaxy Human Capital

idea:
ZTA has created a mobile application. 


It is a mobile application for the consumer to place orders to be delivered at his place of choice from home kitchens managed and run by women. 


It is developed with an aim for homemaker women to become independent and to display their cooking skills and generate a source of income for themselves.


Keeping in mind the COVID-19 pandemic and the fear to eat from restaurants where hygiene levels are not maintained, the listed home kitchens ensure that the food is hygienic and is prepared with a touch of love and is delivered to the end consumer at the consumer's doorstep.
name: ZTA CONGLOMERATE LLP

idea:
SourceLand is an E-commerce marketplace to connect Indian Manufacturers to the Global Markets.

SourceLand helps Indian Manufacturers reach the Global Markets and helps make business easy.

We are a Wholesale E-commerce platform providing every Indian Manufacturer, Trader & MSME.

Our mission is to lead the way to future of Indian E-commerce by making Sales, Purchase, Procurement & Marketing easy for every Manufacturer, Distributor and MSME across India.
name: SourceLand
